html-title: Page title for MWStew that appears on the browser window.
lang-selector-submit: Label for the button in the language selector form
form-section-general-label: Label for the general details section of the form
form-section-devenv-label: Label for the development environment section of the form
form-section-specialpage-label: Label for the special page section of the form
form-section-hooks-label: Label for the hooks section of the form
form-submit-label: Label for the submit button of the form
form-general-field-name-label: Label for the 'Name' field in the form. Only accepts English alphabet, without spaces.
form-general-field-title-label: Label for the 'Title' field in the form. If not used, the extension name is used.
form-general-field-title-placeholder: Placeholder text for the extension title input.
form-general-field-author-label: Label for the 'Author' field in the form.
form-general-field-author-placeholder: Placeholder text for the author input.
form-general-field-version-label: Label for the 'Version' field in the form.
form-general-field-desc-label: Label for the 'Description' field in the form.
form-general-field-desc-placeholder: Placeholder text for the description input.
form-general-field-url-label: Label for the 'URL' field in the form.
form-general-field-license-label: Label for the 'License' field in the form.
form-devenv-field-php-label: Label for the checkbox for development environment tools for PHP
form-devenv-field-js-label: Label for the checkbox for development environment tools for JavaScript
form-specialpage-field-name-label: Label for the 'Special page name' field in the form.
form-specialpage-field-name-prefix: A prefix label for the special page name. It should be the localized alias for 'Special' namespace in MediaWiki.
form-specialpage-field-title-label: Label for the 'Special page title' field in the form.
form-specialpage-field-title-placeholder: Placeholder text for the special page name input.
form-specialpage-field-intro-label: Label for the 'Special page introduction' field in the form.
form-specialpage-field-intro-placeholder: Placeholder text for the special page description input.
